welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kasugai, Japan! Known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 春日井店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 春日井店) is a chinese restaurant located in 春日井市.

restaurants.name: すし市場 正
restaurants.description: すし市場 正 is a sushi restaurant located in 豊山町.
restaurants.address: 大字豊場字八反52-1 (北部市場総合食品ビル南館 1F), 豊山町, 愛知県, 480-0202

restaurants.name: Bronco Billy (ブロンコビリー)
restaurants.description: Bronco Billy (ブロンコビリー) is a steakhouse located in 名古屋市.
restaurants.address: 守山区更屋敷14-18, 名古屋市, 愛知県, 463-0064

restaurants.name: 下町の空名北店
restaurants.description: 下町の空名北店 is a ramen restaurant located in 名古屋市.
restaurants.address: 北区丸新町126, 名古屋市, 愛知県, 480-0202

restaurants.name: 麺屋壱正小牧本店
restaurants.description: 麺屋壱正小牧本店 is a ramen restaurant located in 小牧市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.
